hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | while read f; do case "$f" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json) npx prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; done || true

case "$(uname -s)" in Darwin) osascript -e 'display notification "Awaiting your input" with title "Claude Code"' ;; Linux) command -v notify-send >/dev/null && notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Awaiting your input' ;; esac 2>/dev/null || true

case "$(uname -s)" in Darwin) osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"' ;; Linux) command -v notify-send >/dev/null && notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Task completed' ;; esac 2>/dev/null || true
